headline: TRU Simulation Announces Acceptance of First Unit Training Device Delivery for the Multi-Engine Training System Ground Based Training System Contract; Contract Options Exercised for Additional Devices and Support
summary: TAMPA, Fla., March 26, 2025--TRU Simulation announced the acceptance of the first UTD simulators as part of the METS contract.
